item.title: Adding customs frezzing?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Check your max items int is more than what you’re trying to spawn. Just find a null and swap it with that ID.

item.title: Adding customs frezzing?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

The itemDef.modelID and maleEquip1 should be less than 15000, in 317s. Try turning those zips into a file less than 15000, and let’s see what happens.

Whac

Read full topic

item.title: Adding customs frezzing?
item.dc:creator: @fav fav
item.description:
@fav wrote:

everytime i try added the Korasi and i do add model ***** the model and i set the int’s, my client freezes?
how can i fix this my int’s

break;
case 13350:
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 25;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 60;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1400;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 60;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 700;
itemDef.modelID = 57780;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 57784;
itemDef.name = “Korasi’s sword”;
itemDef.description = “The sword of a Void Knight.”.getBytes();
break;
